footer.description: A reference for Flutter developers and enthusiasts in Iran

title.sub: The Beating Heart of Flutter Iran

description: Welcome to the main reference for Flutter developers in Iran.
This is a place for learning, sharing experiences, and growing your skills.
Join us to shape the future of mobile development with Flutter.

youtube.description: Access to latest videos, interviews and tutorials

staffSection.title: Active members of the Persian Flutter community
staffSection.description: In this section, you will get to know the individuals who are the driving force behind the Persian Flutter community with their efforts and enthusiasm. These active members, with various specialties, play key roles in advancing our community's goals and growth. From managing social media to organizing events, each of these individuals has an important role in the dynamism and progress of the Persian Flutter ecosystem.
staffSection.descriptionShort: In this section, you will get to know the individuals who are the driving force behind the Persian Flutter community with their efforts and enthusiasm. These active members, with various specialties, play key roles in advancing our community's goals and growth.

donation.subtitle: Flutter Farsi community has grown with your love and efforts and today it has reached a point where it can be a valuable resource for thousands of developers. Your financial support helps us to :
donation.donationText: Any amount, however small, is a sign of your trust and motivates us to continue our journey with more strength. With your support, we can make Flutter Farsi community one of the best educational resources in the world of programming. .
features: Improve the technical infrastructure of the society
Improve the quality of existing content
